You would think this should be easy - describe relevant features of the pants. But no...they couldn't even do that. "Elastic Drawstring Waist" was what I was expecting - and they do have that, but they also have a ZIPPER and button closure. The elastic waist is not flexible enough to take the pants on/off without also undoing the zipper. I did not want "Zippered Pants" - which should have been incredibly easy to say and show. Maybe I should have watched all the videos? Oh wait, I did. Nowhere do they show a zipper is needed to put these on or take them off. FWIW, I got the black version. They are not see-through and don't feel super light. Who knows how long they'll last, but for now I have less-than-loungey lounge pants.

I'm 6'1, 375 but a husky 375 not soft.... well I needed something linen'ish for the beach and have never found a lake or plants that "fit to size" for us big guys. We'll I have a 44/46 waist and longer legs. I ordered the XXXL and not only do they fit like a champ but they have PLENTY of stretch to go bigger and a string to sinch a little. It's a button with zipper, and appears to be sturdy. The material is soft, white in color and 2 pockets. Wrinkled of course but going to light iron or wrinkle release in the dryer not to shrink them. I feel the cost to value is definitely worth it! Cheers to the next biggun that orders, order true!
